title: Vijay Sethupathi T Rajendhar Madonna Sebastian Kavan release date March 31 - Tamil Movie News

persons.name: vijay sethupathi t rajendhar madonna sebastian kavan

text: Interesting details about TR's character and acting in 'Kavan' One of the most expected action entertainers of the year ‘Kavan’ directed by K. V. Anand is hitting the screens on the 31st of March, according to an official press statement from AGS Entertainment. ‘Kavan’ has Vijay Sethupathi as a common man taking on a large corrupt corporate organization with Madonna Sebastian as his leading lady. T. Rajendhar is playing a pivotal role while the heavy weight supporting cast includes Vikranth, Chandini Tamilarasan, Jagan and Pandiarajan. Considering the wide variety of roles that Vijay Sethupathi seems handle with such an ease that he instantly becomes a hit with the audiences this film too is spoken as one more feather in his cap by industry insiders.
